Articles.Content:
For some reason i have alot of problems with KSP most of them are done but some are not.

1. The glass on the helmet is blue or purple (I'm colorblind btw so i might be wrong with the color.) i first thought because i downloaded some suits and they didn't work so i uninstalled it and nothing happened. The other suit is normal.

I might have more but ill just leave this  until i find something else.

Hello @LukaDaBoi.

I have moved your question to technical support (PC, modded).

It would be really helpful if you could provide more information like a mod list and KSP logs. Luckily we have a great guide:
